name: Goosebumps: Fill in the Title Trivia Game | Kid Lit Authors L - Z | 10 Questions

questions.text: What word is missing from the title? 'One Day at ___'
questions.explanation:
Horrorland.

	'One Day at Horroland' has another book called 'Return to Horroland'. In this book, a family goes to Horroland mistaking it for the amusement park they're supposed to go to.

questions.text: What word is missing from the title? 'Beware the ____'
questions.explanation:
Snowman.

	'Beware the Snowman' is when Jacklyn moves to Sherpia from Chicago. This is where she gets reunited with her father who stayed in Sherpia to protect the village from the evil snowman.

questions.text: What word is missing from the title? 'Monster ___'
questions.explanation:
Blood.

	'Monster Blood' had four parts. It's in a can and if eaten it can make anyone humongous.

questions.text: What word is missing from the title? 'How I got my Shrunken ____'
questions.explanation:
Head.

	The book is about a boy who gets a shrunken head from his Aunt.

questions.text: What word is missing from the title? 'My Best Friend is  ____'
questions.explanation:
Invisible.

	'My Best Friend is Invisible' is about a city where monsters live. There were these scientists who had a human son. They were disgraced by him and turned him invisible. Then, he started bothering other families.

questions.text: What word is missing from the title? 'How I Learned to ____'
questions.explanation:
Fly.

	This book is quite famous in the series and the title says it all- somebody learns to fly.

questions.text: What word is missing from the title? 'The Abominable Snowman of  ____'
questions.explanation:
Pasadena.

	This books is when Justin and Nicole go to Pasadena with their dad and meet a real evil monster!

questions.text: What word is missing from the title? 'Go Eat ____'
questions.explanation:
Worms.

	This book is about when a girl eats worms.

questions.text: What word is missing from the title? 'Chicken ____'
questions.explanation:
Chicken.

	This book is about when Vanessa grows chicken feathers.

questions.text: What word is missing from the title? 'Legend of the Lost ____'
questions.explanation:
Legend.

	This book is about when Marissa and her brother look for a lost legend!
